mapper.sql: serial_id AS "serialId", date AS "date", serial_length AS "serialLength" ,model AS "model", num AS "num", create_user AS "createUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_user AS "updateUser", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from serial_number where 1 = 1
and serial_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialId},'%')
and date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.date},'%')
and model like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.model},'%')
and num like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.num},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
